Name: Ronister Adventure
About the game: Horrible creatures ravaged the entire autumn, taking their sacred fruits to other lands. Now Ronister goes out on an adventure around the world, facing various enemies and obstacles. On his journey he'll find vehicles and will get unique abilities to save our planet from the terrible Evil Bat. * Story mode with narration * Many stages to overcome * Inspired by classic games * 2D platform Follow our channels and pages: Instagram: @ronik_games Facebook: ronikgames Youtube: Ronister Oficial Thanks for playing!
